messages.title: Lib Dems to freeze Council Tax again
messages.content: The Lib Dem team are backing a Council Tax freeze. Liberal Democrats on Camden Council are set to help local residents by freezing council tax for another year.

messages.title: Labour's failure on gun and knife crime
messages.content: Many local residents are angry at Labour's failure to tackle serious crimes such as gun and knife crime. A shocking 50% increase of such crimes was recorded during the last year with only a caution under Gordon Brown's Labour Government.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are committed to freezing Council Tax to help local residents.
The Liberal Democrats aim to tackle serious crimes like gun and knife crime, which have increased under Labour's governance.
The Liberal Democrats, represented by Jo Shaw, are fighting to protect local Accident & Emergency services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Liberal Democrats can beat Labour here.

issues.health: Local Liberal Democrat Jo Shaw is fighting to protect local Accident & Emergency services.

leaflet.personalStatement: A different kind of MP - Jo Shaw is leading the fight against Gordon Brown's Labour NHS cuts in Camden.

contactInformation.address: Camden Lib Dems, Freepost RSC1 UKCK-XCBZ, 53 Reachview Close NW1 0TY

images.caption: Conservatives out of the race here in Camden.
